header.name: Anu Shibin Joseph Raj

header.description: Full-Stack developer specializing in Java, ReactJS, Docker, and Microservices architecture. Passionate about creating efficient, scalable and maintainable software solutions for enterprise problems.

experience.description: Leading a team of 8 developers creating enterprise content management solutions
responsibilities: Mentoring the juniors in the team
Making architectural product decisions and changes to the product

experience.description: Developed full-stack applications for finance and healthcare industries
responsibilities: Designing new solutions for solving bottlenecks in the product
Created 2 new React & Spring-based internal tools to ease the work within the team
Added Teamcity integration to 2 products and actively maintaining them

experience.description: Worked on various Java J2EE applications
responsibilities: Build Advocate for 3 products - Taking care of build failures and making sure that all the build environments are up and available round the clock
Buddy for newcomers - Helping new teammates get up to speed with our products

experience.description: Fast onboarding and learning the waters as a Java developer
responsibilities: Java Developer for 3 products - Developing, fixing, and maintaining
Security Advocate for 3 products - Keeping an eye on all the Security & License vulnerabilities in all these projects. Also, motivating the Team to focus on a security-compliant code
Scrum Master for 2 products - Taking care of the Sprint, triaging issues, and making sure that no issues are missed from the backlog

VMware vCloud Admin for 3 products - Managing all the VMs and keeping an eye on the available hardware resources and notifying upper management about extra requirements so that the teams always have ample amount of development and testing ground
Product Integration - Worked on adding support for a new Database on an existing product
